name: Cycle of Collapse
description:
The ground you are standing on is about to collapse! Grow trees and use their materials to create new ground to grow more trees.  But the longer you survive, the faster the ground collapses.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Use Axe / Place Gound: Left Mouse Button
  • Switch Tool: Q / E / Mouse  Wheel

This game was made for the 160th Weekly Game Jam. It was made in  5 days to fit the theme of  'Nothing Stays Forever'.
